intros l1 l2 e Hsorted Hin.
destruct (findGtIndex_app_in_2 l1 l2 e Hsorted Hin) as [l' [HfindGtIndex HPrefix]].
assert (eIndex e <= maxIndex l2).
{ eapply sorted_app_in_1; eauto. }
assert (eIndex e = maxIndex l2).
{ eapply contiguous_0_app; eauto.
  - eapply contiguous_app_prefix_contiguous; eauto.
    + eapply HPrefix.
    + eapply Hsorted.
    + eapply HfindGtIndex.
    + left; eauto.
  - eapply H.
}
rewrite H1 in HfindGtIndex.
injection HfindGtIndex; intros; subst.
rewrite H0; auto.
Qed.
